title: Not possible to select several price ranges when searching products

description.steps_to_reproduce: 1. Go to URL: https://www.janisroze.lv/lv/; 2. Select any category, for example, Grāmatas → Daiļliteratūra; 3. Scroll down to the price ranges on the left (Cenas); 4. Select several price ranges
description.expected_result: User should be able to select several price ranges, for example, €10,00 - €19,99, €20,00 - €29,99, €30,00 - €39,99
description.actual_result: It is possible to select only one price range. The field in which user can enter price ranges doesn’t work
